type_info_implementation.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_SERIALIZATION_TYPE_INFO_IMPLEMENTATION_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_TYPE_INFO_IMPLEMENTATION_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // type_info_implementation.hpp: interface for portable version of type_info
00011 
00012 // (C) Copyright 2002 Robert Ramey - http://www.rrsd.com . 
00013 // Use, modification and distribution is subject to the Boost Software
00014 // License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at
00015 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00016 
00017 //  See http://www.boost.org for updates, documentation, and revision history.
00018 
00019 
00020 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/detail/workaround.hpp>
00022 
00023 #include <boost/static_assert.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/mpl/eval_if.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/mpl/identity.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/type_traits/is_base_and_derived.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/serialization/traits.hpp>
00028 
00029 namespace boost {
00030 namespace serialization {
00031 
00032 // note that T and const T are folded into const T so that
00033 // there is only one table entry per type
00034 template<class T>
00035 struct type_info_implementation {
00036     template<class U>
00037     struct traits_class_typeinfo_implementation {
00038       typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME U::type_info_implementation::type type;
00039     };
00040     // note: at least one compiler complained w/o the full qualification
00041     // on basic traits below
00042     typedef 
00043         BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME mpl::eval_if<
00044             is_base_and_derived<boost::serialization::basic_traits, T>,
00045             traits_class_typeinfo_implementation<T>,
00046         //else
00047             mpl::identity<
00048                 BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME extended_type_info_impl<T>::type
00049             >
00050         >::type type;
00051 };
00052 
00053 } // namespace serialization
00054 } // namespace boost
00055 
00056 // define a macro to assign a particular derivation of extended_type_info
00057 // to a specified a class. 
00058 #if BOOST_WORKAROUND(__BORLANDC__, BOOST_TESTED_AT(0x560))
00059 #define BOOST_CLASS_TYPE_INFO(T, ETI)              \
00060 namespace boost {                                  \
00061 namespace serialization {                          \
00062 template<>                                         \
00063 struct type_info_implementation< T > {             \
00064     typedef const ETI type;                        \
00065 };                                                 \
00066 }                                                  \
00067 }                                                  \
00068 
00069 #else
00070 #define BOOST_CLASS_TYPE_INFO(T, ETI)              \
00071 namespace boost {                                  \
00072 namespace serialization {                          \
00073 template<>                                         \
00074 struct type_info_implementation< T > {             \
00075     typedef ETI type;                              \
00076 };                                                 \
00077 template<>                                         \
00078 struct type_info_implementation< const T > {       \
00079     typedef ETI type;                              \
00080 };                                                 \
00081 }                                                  \
00082 }                                                  \
00083 
00084 #endif
00085 
00086 #endif
